key.name: showlog
key.description: Whether to show the log tab

key.name: loglevel
key.description: The log level which is used by default

key.name: validate
key.description: Whether to automatically validate when a card is inserted.

key.name: cert-paned-pos
key.summary: Position of the Paned on the "certificates" tab
key.description: How high the upper part of the paned on the "certificates" page should be (in pixels)

key.name: check-urls
key.summary: Check the OCSP/CRL URLs against the whitelist
key.description: The viewer has a whitelist of known OCSP and CRL URLs that are used in production cards. This whitelist ensures that test cards are never accepted as valid cards. Enable this option if you do want your test cards to validate

key.name: check-update
key.description: The eID viewer has the ability to check whether the running version is the most recent one. If this option is disabled, then the test will not run at startup (only when the "check for update" button is explicitly pressed).
